In England, in the seven days to 19 October, there were 273,100 new confirmed cases (482.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 October, there were 232,296 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 18% (40,804 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 October is 7,462,144 (13,195.6 cases per 100,000 population).
